original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽10.4. Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka🔽Nakusalaṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika cūḍantaraduka  na kusalam na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na asaṅkhatam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.🔽Nakusalaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca 🔽hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa 🔽na kusalam na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta 🔽hetuyā nava pe avigate nava 🔽na kusalam na rūpim dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
translated: As root-cause, twenty-four … As kamma-result, nine … As an object of exploration, twenty-four.

analyzed: na kusalam na arūpim dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a profitable, immaterial, not-sensed-here-and-now, unclassifiable dhammā as condition … (Abbreviated.)
As root-cause, nine … As an object of exploration, nine.

analyzed: na kusalam na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a profitable, not-supermundane, not-sensed-here-and-now, unclassifiable dhammā as condition … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa
translated: As root-cause, seventeen … As a decisive-support, nine … As kamma-result, nine … As an object of exploration, seventeen.

analyzed: na kusalam na lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a profitable, supermundane, not-sensed-here-and-now, unclassifiable dhammā as condition … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: As root-cause, thirty-one … As object, twenty-four … As kamma-result, nine … As an object of exploration, thirty-one.

original: Nakusalaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca
